meanings.sent1: She preprograms her coffee maker every night to brew coffee in the morning.
meanings.sent2: The robot preprograms its movements before starting the task.
meanings.sent3: The computer preprograms a surprise message to pop up on the screen.
meanings.sent4: His mind preprograms the steps needed to solve the puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The chef preprograms the oven to start baking the cake at the right time.

meanings.definition: A program that is set up in advance.
meanings.sent1: The preprograms on the DVD player make it easy to watch movies.
meanings.sent2: The preprograms on the thermostat help regulate the temperature in the house.
meanings.sent3: The preprograms on the alarm clock wake you up with your favorite song.
meanings.sent4: The preprograms on the car radio play the driver's favorite stations.
meanings.sent5: The preprograms on the microwave make cooking meals faster and more convenient.
